Text:
This torrent lists the images by filename, and not by their date =/

Quite useless im afraid, as not reading them in chronological order is a pain and waste. Thanks anyway
Tnx for collecting these, it's a great comic. :)
asestar > just sort the file list by date, you know clicking the date column title.
I'm not reseeding this one anymore, but you can expect an updated version in a not so far future.
